channel.title: How does one gain the ability to post links/images?
channel.description:
Trying to post about an upcoming launch I have to garner feedback, but not able to post links :thinking:.
I made my introduction post awhile back, how does one get the ability to post a link or images?

item.title: How does one gain the ability to post links/images?
item.dc:creator: jondavidjohn
item.description:
Looks like I got upgraded since I turned on browser notifications

Alright, I’m good

As a note though it might be good to have a post somewhere about trust levels (didn’t know that’s what discuss calls them).

Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How does one gain the ability to post links/images?
